AllPage.about_us_section_four_subtitle: Decades of experience in Accounting and Consulting
AllPage.about_us_section_one_point_one_text: Our experts analyze your current processes to see how we can help you.
AllPage.about_us_section_one_point_three_text: Welcome to the digital world. No more paper, almost all your processes are automated and paperless.
AllPage.about_us_section_one_point_two_text: After the insight, our experts define a strategy on how you can best transform your company.
AllPage.about_us_section_one_subtitle: DIGITAL is the top priority in our company. We are convinced that modern methods, such as digital accounting will open new and more advantageous ways for all of us.
AllPage.about_us_section_one_title: Your journey from CLASSIC to DIGITAL
AllPage.about_us_section_three_subtitle: Digitization and digital transformation in accounting and bookkeeping are becoming a necessity for companies. Not only to save money and resources but also to increase the efficiency of your daily business processes.
AllPage.about_us_section_three_title: An exceptionally unique experience tailored just for you.
AllPage.about_us_section_two_subtitle: It's always easy to write the best and most beautiful things about yourself, but what really counts, in the end, is the opinion of the customers.
AllPage.about_us_section_two_title: Don't just take our word for it, see what our customers say.
AllPage.about_us_subtitle: Our company made it its duty to provide our clients **a comprehensive and individual** service. We make day-to-day business easier and safer and support investments, planning, and international business with transparent and flexible consultation Even in **turbulent times**, which business life often brings with it, we keep an overview. We advise and accompany our clients and are there when it matters most.

AllPage.banner_text_bottom: Some services process personal data in the USA. By consenting to the use of these services, you also consent to the processing of your data in the USA in accordance with Art. 49 (1) lit. a DSGVO. The ECJ classifies the USA as a country with insufficient data protection according to EU standards. For example, there is a risk that U.S. authorities will process personal data in surveillance programs without an existing possibility of legal action for Europeans..
AllPage.banner_text_middle1: We use Cookies and other Technologies on our website. Some of them are essential, while some of them are there to improve your experience on our website. Personal data may be processed (e.g IP address) for personalized ads. For further information about how we use your data, please see our

AllPage.banner_text_top: We need your consent before you can continue to visit our site.
AllPage.career_box_eight_text: We give our support to various projects, organizations, and people, among them, are students and sports communities.
AllPage.career_box_five_text: Sweets and desserts are always ready for our sweet tooth, BUT also enough fruit, drinks, and especially plenty of coffee are available in our kitchen.
AllPage.career_box_four_text: We are a young and dynamic team that values cooperation and collaboration.
AllPage.career_box_nine_text: We want to be part of the contribution to the world. That's the reason we are part of digitalization too.
AllPage.career_box_one_text: We offer our employees performance-based pay to motivate them and increase productivity.
AllPage.career_box_seven_text: Only when you are healthy are you happy. In addition to an ergonomic workplace, we also ensure the mental health of our employees.
AllPage.career_box_six_text: We organize regular trips and workshops to strengthen our team and to develop personal relations.
AllPage.career_box_tree_text: With us, there is no 08-15 job. We give flexibility and individuality, and allow our employees to work from home and arrange their own working hours.
AllPage.career_box_two_text: We support you in your education and further training. Together we create a plan and support you.
AllPage.career_job_default_text: Apply and we will keep you up to date!
AllPage.career_job_default_title: Is your dream job not yet there?
AllPage.career_job_one_text: With the help of our accounting team, you will support our clients from various industries. You are the contact person for your clients in all tax-related issues. With your professional and friendly manner and your technical competence, you ensure the best possible support for our clients..
AllPage.career_job_two_text: We are a dynamic team and a young, fast-growing company based in Vienna, which currently employs 23 employees. We are looking for immediate support for our payroll accounting team.
AllPage.career_section_one_subtitle: Individual career opportunities are promoted by us and actively shaped together with the employees.
AllPage.career_section_one_title:
Join a workplace
that offers you more
AllPage.career_section_three_text: There are countless good reasons to work for us and we hate to brag, but honestly it's too hard not to!
AllPage.career_section_three_title: Why our Team is the best!
AllPage.career_section_two_subtitle: Here you can find the open positions. You can apply directly via buttons.
AllPage.career_section_two_title:
Select Category
in which you are an expert
AllPage.career_subtitle: Our focus is always to find the perfect match. To us, a perfect match occurs when two parties are satisfied and can collaborate. The bar is high, but you seem ready to take on the challenge.
AllPage.career_title:
Work with us,
the great team
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_box_1_tex: We are here for you in the first steps of your company. Our experts advise and help you in the foundation of your company in Austria.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_box_2_tex:
Our experts help you with the problems that may arise along the way. 
We ensure everything is neat and tidy.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_box_3_tex:
Austria incentivizes businesses, and business people to invest and grow the Austrian economy even more. 
We suggest the most suitable government fundings for your company.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_box_4_tex: Are you planning to make some significant changes in your company? Let ambiCON's experts advise you on the financial and operational structure of your company.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_box_5_tex:
Our experts assess your company valuation after careful inspection based on specific parameters. 
We provide transparent and accurate estimations.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_box_6_tex: We help you to buy and sell companies in Austria. Our experts are keen to serve both the seller and buyer in the best way possible.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_subtitle_:
Our professionals have a passion for all types of businesses - whether one-man/one-woman company, start-up, SME or corporation. 
We listen to you, find the right solutions for you, and protect you from making decisions with serious consequences.
Of course, our ideas are tailored to your business model, because we analyze the challenges with you and support you in the best possible way.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_text_part: We help you with all questions regarding **management consultation** - ranging from founding a company to restructuring your company.
Contact one of our experts for the first appointment and we will help you to answer any questions you may have regarding management consulting.
AllPage.company_consulting_section_one_title: Management Consulting - also for digital change
AllPage.company_consulting_subtitle_part_1: Our professionals will help you see what your company's strengths and weaknesses are.
AllPage.company_consulting_subtitle_part_2: We analyze your competitors for you, create comparative analyses, show you how to get the best funding, and advise you on strategic transformation and operational implementation.
AllPage.company_consulting_title:
Your **success** and your satisfaction
are our priorities

AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_box_1_tex: Through digital accounting, various processes will be simplified. Therefore, your employees gain time for other tasks.
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_box_2_tex: Digital means less paperwork! Which in turn means less paper and also less space requirement for those papers. Simply sustainable!
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_box_3_tex: Access your accounting data anytime, anywhere. Doesn't that sound appealing?
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_box_4_tex: All reports are in one place and are available to you and your employees at any time. This lets you analyze them effectively.
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_box_5_tex: All necessary data is exchanged digitally, and this simplifies communication between you, your employees, and your accountant or tax consultant.
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_box_6_tex: Your digital documents are stored in audit-proof archives and can be restored quickly, even in the event of a cyber-attack. High standards on the best-protected servers in the EU ensure maximum data protection.
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_subtilte: There are many reasons to avoid using paper and to process documents, invioices, bank statements, etc. digitally. Fast, convenient and easy - that's how accounting should be, that's what **Digital Accounting** is all about!
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_section_one_text:
We at **ambiCON GmbH** are happy to accompany you on your way into the future of accounting.

Book an appointment with us today! We will analyze your company together and help you with the transformation from classic to digital accounting!
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_subtitle: Be it consulting, implementation, or ongoing accounting, we use various steps to optimize your bookkeeping.
AllPage.digitalaccountancy_subtitle_part_2: You are just in the right place, let us make your company fit for the future.

AllPage.index_header_h1: Welcome to the future through Digital Accounting
AllPage.index_header_text_part_1: We help you to lead your company to success. Our professional team supports you with organizing and managing your day-to-day bookkeeping and payroll accounting. In addition to classic bookkeeping, we are also offering electronic accounting with automated posting and automated invoice transfer.
AllPage.index_section_one_box_one_text: Digitalize your accounting. Our professional team supports you with organizing and managing your day-to-day bookkeeping and payroll accounting.
AllPage.index_section_one_box_three_text: Bring your accounting to a new level, Digital Level. Our professional team supports you with organizing and managing your day-to-day bookkeeping and payroll accounting.
AllPage.index_section_one_box_two_text: Digitize your payroll and make your work easier. Our professional team supports you with organizing and managing your day-to-day bookkeeping and payroll accounting.
AllPage.index_section_one_subtitle: With digitalizing your bookkeeping as well as your payroll accounting processes, you don't only save time, but also money.
AllPage.index_section_three_text: We keep you updated on the latest developments with articles from the tax and digitalization world!
AllPage.index_section_two_point_four_text: We help you in monitoring and settlement of your obligations to the tax office.
AllPage.index_section_two_point_one_text: Digitalize your accounting and save time while putting an end to papers. Time is money!
AllPage.index_section_two_point_three_text: Check and Control from anywhere with an internet connection - on Smartphone, on Desktop, or on Tablet.
AllPage.index_section_two_point_two_text: Having the right tool means a lot, and we have them!
AllPage.index_section_two_text: We create an individual concept for you and keep you up to date to achieve the most optimal and cost-effective results. Bring your business to the next level!
AllPage.index_section_two_title: Digital Accounting - You are in the right place.

AllPage.payroll_accounting_faq_subtitle: Curious? Read through some of our FAQs or contact us for help
AllPage.payroll_accounting_section_one_subtitle: In the area of labor and social security law you need an experienced partner at your side. You are already in the right place, book your appointment now.
AllPage.payroll_accounting_section_one_text_box_: We will guide you through the entire hiring process and will be happy to answer any questions you may have.
At the beginning of the employment relationship, it is necessary to classify the employee(s) in the wage or salary schedule. Play it safe and leave these matters to our professionals.

What types of service contracts are there? Which service contract is applicable in my case? What do I have to pay attention to? These and many more questions on the topic of "contracts" will be answered by our trained employees.
Leave the payroll of your employees in experienced hands and sit back.
We also take care of your annual payroll reports incl. L16, municipal tax return, control and reconciliation of monthly reports.

We advise you on the optimization of your wage and salary costs. Together with you, we analyze and plan the possibilities of tax- and SV-free salary components, as well as possible benefits for your employees.
AllPage.payroll_accounting_section_one_title: We help you to digitize your payroll accounting
AllPage.payroll_accounting_subtitle_part_1: You need support with the organization and management of your current payroll accounting?
AllPage.payroll_accounting_subtitle_part_2: Contact us for the first appointment! Together we plan your payroll accounting so that you keep the overview.
AllPage.payroll_accounting_title:
An **up-to-date** payroll accounting
saves you both time and stress
AllPage.payroll_acounting_section_one_text:
Through our **DIGITAL FIRST** approach, we are committed to eliminating paperwork. 
Payroll accounting is exclusively electronic and digital - thus effective, fast, and environmentally friendly.

AllPage.seo_tax_consultant_description: A well-coordinated team keeps track of things for you and prepares your annual financial summary.
AllPage.statistics_text: Statistical Cookies capture information anonymously. This information helps us to understand why our visitors are using our website.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_subtitle: Our accounting includes creating individual concepts tailored to small corporations under § 221 UGB. These concepts keep your company up-to-date throughout the year and help you achieve optimal and cost-effective results while ensuring that your balance sheet does not exceed the set thresholds of a balance sheet total of EUR 5 million and sales revenues of EUR 10 million.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_1: Our permanent tax partner provides professional support for all your tax return needs. Additionally, we are authorized to represent you before federal tax authorities in specific tax and duty matters, under § 2 BiBuG*.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_1_le:
§ 2 paragraph 1 item 5: representation including the submission of declarations in matters of VAT advance notifications and summary reports, representation including registration, termination, and submission of declarations in matters of the special schemes in § 25a, § 25b, and Art. 25a UStG 1994 (notwithstanding § 25b paragraph 1 item 2 or § 27 paragraph 8 UStG 1994), as well as the declaration for the use of credits (§ 214 of the Federal Tax Code, BGBl. No. 194/1961)
§ 2 paragraph 1 item 7: representation including the submission of declarations in matters of payroll accounting and payroll-related taxes, as well as representation in the context of the joint audit of all payroll-related taxes, but not representation in appeal proceedings
§ 2 paragraph 2 item 5: representation in matters of chamber contributions towards statutory interest representations
§ 2 paragraph 2 item 7: representation in all matters of the registration and deregistration of cash registers
§ 2 paragraph 2 item 8: advice and representation in matters of the register of beneficial owners, including the notification of the beneficial owner based on the information of their clients and the determination and verification of the beneficial owner on behalf of their clients
§ 2 paragraph 1 item 4: representation in tax and tax penalty proceedings for federal, state, and municipal taxes, excluding representation before federal tax authorities, administrative courts, and the Constitutional Court, as well as representation in matters of the COVID-19 Support Examination Act (CFPG), BGBl. I No. 44/2020
§ 75 paragraph 2: representation and issuance of certificates concerning measures related to managing the COVID-19 crisis situation
§ 2 paragraph 2 item 3: advice and representation before legally recognized churches and religious communities in contribution matters
§ 2 paragraph 2 item 4: representation before the institutions of the employment service, professional organizations, regional tourism associations, and other authorities and offices responsible for economic matters, insofar as these are directly related to activities to be carried out for the same client according to paragraph 1.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_2: We create your tax-optimized Accounting on a Tax Basis and help you meet the legal requirements.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_3: From double-entry bookkeeping, we create your optimal and UGB-compliant balance sheet, specifically designed for small corporations under § 221 UGB. In doing so, we ensure that the balance sheet total does not exceed EUR 5 million, the sales revenues do not exceed EUR 10 million, and that on average, no more than 50 employees are employed.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_4: Together with our partners we monitor your company and react before the balance sheet date in a tax-optimal way. Thus you can plan and react in time.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_5: A good overview of the income and costs in your company offers important additional information for the further development of your company processes. Learn from the past for a better future for your company.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_box_6: We take over the monitoring and regulation of your obligations to the tax office for you, Social Security, and other Obligations.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_part_1: Together with our partners we inform you regularly about your overall situation of finance and accounting. This allows you to make rapid and demand-oriented adjustments, as well as to set measures. A tax-optimized result is our common goal.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_text_part_2: Through our DIGITAL FIRST approach, we commit to avoiding paperwork. The annual financial statement within the value limits of § 2 BiBuG* is prepared exclusively electronically and digitally - making it efficient, fast, and environmentally friendly.
AllPage.tax_consultant_section_one_title_box_6: Representation before the authorities mentioned in § 2 BiBuG*
AllPage.tax_consultant_subtitle: A well-coordinated team keeps track of your records and prepares your annual financial statement within the value limits of § 2 paragraph 2 item 2 BiBuG in conjunction with § 221 UGB*.
